title: New: Young Wonder – Tumbling Backwards
content: Hailing from Cork, Ireland, electro-pop duo Young Wonder are set to release their debut EP in mid April, preceded by lead single Tumbling Backwards. As the first signing to Media Production company turned record label Feel Good Lost, it’s a stellar introduction to both projects. Taking from dance and trance influences, it’s heavy on the side-chain compression and reverb drenched vocals, conjuring up a majestic and mystical atmosphere in which the track elegantly twists and pirouettes. Check out Tumbling Backwards below, and download it for free.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
